backend/main.mo: Entry point for the Motoko backend actor that includes blob storage functionality via a mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features (phone number updates and years-of-experience changes) to their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's component structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including backgrounds, borders, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app with a root div and a module script tag pointing to main.tsx, titled 'Mahakal Electricals'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles all page sections (Navbar, Hero, About, Brands, Products, Services, Contact, Footer, WhatsApp button) into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section displaying shop image, owner names, address, a '2+ Years of Experience' badge, and a highlights checklist in a two-column layout.
frontend/src/components/BrandsSection.ts: Responsive grid showcasing 12 electrical brand tiles with emoji icons and brand-specific colors, featuring gold-border hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact section with shop address, two clickable tel: phone numbers (9630232599 and 9179142549), a WhatsApp link, business hours, and a local enquiry form with success feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Dark navy footer with brand info, quick navigation links, both updated phone numbers as clickable tel: links, a WhatsApp link, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the hero banner section with a background image, overlay, headline, CTA buttons for scrolling to products/contact, and a stats row showing brands, products, and experience.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with logo, desktop nav links, a contact button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu with smooth-scroll behavior.
Displays a categorized product catalog (fans, lights, switches, wires, MCBs, inverters) with brand names, product names, descriptions, and icons organized in a grid layout.
Renders a grid of six electrical service cards (wiring, fan repair, MCB repair, inverter service, industrial wiring, home automation) with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Fixed floating WhatsApp chat button linking to a pre-filled WhatsApp message for the store's phone number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, identity persistence, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file with no active queries, reserved for future backend integrations on this static website.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Poppins font, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for a navy/gold brand palette along with utility classes for colors, shadows, and section padding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with Poppins font, navy/gold/whatsapp brand colors mapped to oklch CSS variables, custom shadows, border radii, and animation keyframes, plus typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 5) describing the Mahakal Electricals single-page website, including its architectural notes, existing feature list with IDs, known issues, and product/brand catalog structure.
